title: Why did I get AFK?
body: Since my internet is slow i my league was loading for the game but then as soon as i got connected unfortunatly my team quit and i got afk

replies.body:
there is  a new system in place that if a player is afk on your team for more than 90 seconds at the 5min mark the team can choose to remake the game(early surrender) but only the player and anyone they were grouped with will get the punished

i recommend not playing if your game/internet takes longer than 5mins connect and to get to 100%
